faq.title: Find Answers to Common Questions Here
faq.subtitle: Discover a suite of powerful, easy-to-use features designed to enhance your productivity, streamline your workflow, and deliver exceptional results—whether you’re working solo or as part of a team.

q1.q: What can I use the AI models for?
q1.a: Our AI models can be used for a wide variety of tasks including content generation, data analysis, image creation, code assistance, writing support, research, brainstorming, and much more. Whether you're working on creative projects, business applications, or personal tasks, our models are designed to adapt to your specific needs.

q2.q: Do I need technical skills to use it?
q2.a: No technical skills are required! Our platform is designed to be user-friendly and accessible to everyone. Simply describe what you want to accomplish in plain language, and the AI will understand and assist you. However, having technical knowledge can help you leverage more advanced features and capabilities.

q3.q: Is my data private and secure?
q3.a: Yes, we take data privacy and security very seriously. Your conversations and data are encrypted, and we follow industry-standard security practices. We do not sell your personal information to third parties. Please review our privacy policy for detailed information about how we handle and protect your data.

q4.q: Can I customize the AI's personality?
q4.a: Yes, you can customize how the AI responds to you. You can set preferences for tone, formality level, response length, and communication style. Some plans also offer advanced customization options where you can create specific personas or adjust the AI's behavior to match your workflow and preferences.

q5.q: What formats can I export content in?
q5.a: You can export content in multiple formats including plain text (.txt), Markdown (.md), PDF, Word documents (.docx), HTML, and more. The available export options may vary depending on the type of content and your subscription plan. You can also copy content directly to your clipboard for easy pasting.

q6.q: Can I use the AI-generated content?
q6.a: Yes, you can use AI-generated content for your projects. However, we recommend reviewing and editing the content to ensure it meets your specific needs and standards. While you have rights to use the output, you should be aware that AI-generated content may not be eligible for copyright protection in all jurisdictions. Always verify factual information and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

q7.q: Is there a limit to generate?
q7.a: Usage limits depend on your subscription plan. Free plans typically have daily or monthly limits on the number of requests or tokens you can use. Paid plans offer higher limits or unlimited usage. You can check your current usage and limits in your account dashboard. If you reach your limit, you can upgrade your plan or wait until your quota resets.
